name: Reflectica
description:
IPFS CID: QmRfsUVBHEiBsQeDHPC3JmC9TsYH6WvQ8gm2gs4BedbDMG

Pinata: https://gateway.pinata.cloud/ipfs/QmRfsUVBHEiBsQeDHPC3JmC9TsYH6WvQ8gm2gs4BedbDMG...

The walls are closing in! Your arrows mirror each other, but the obstacles do not. Stay alive as long as you can.

A/D or left/right arrow keys: Rotate

W/S or up/down arrow keys: Expand/Contract

All art and code was created by me during the jam. I wrote the music earlier, but remixed it for this game. Inspired by Super Hexagon.
